'''Khayyam's Final Words''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Mawtiyima Forest]], [[Sumeru]].

The player needs to complete ''[[Memory's Final Chapter]]'' in order to trigger this follow-up quest.

==Steps== 
# Change the time to the next in-game day after completing ''[[Memory's Final Chapter]]''.
# Talk to [[Khayyam]] near his camp in [[Mawtiyima Forest]].
#: <gallery>
NPC Location Khayyam.png|Start location
NPC Location Khayyam Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Gameplay Notes== 
*Completing this Hidden Exploration Objective will grant the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement ''[[A Walnut Tree Amidst the Gardens]]''.
*Completing this objective also completes Part IV: Agnihotra Sutra of the [[Aranyaka (Gadget)|Forest Adventure Journal]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Khayyam)
:'''Khayyam:''' Oh hello, (Traveler) and Paimon!
:'''Khayyam:''' Haha... It's good to see you again! Oh, and this is for you. Please don't forget...
:'''Khayyam:''' Although I can't see my friends from the past anymore, seeing this forest revitalized gives me all the satisfaction I desire. For that, I thank you.
:'''Khayyam:''' Ah yes, you must take this.
:'''Khayyam:''' Please don't forget your passion as Javans.
{{Dialogue end}}
